spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Amble és un/a llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 12. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Saviesa ({@dc 16} salvada de conjur, {@hit 8} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de druida preparats:

trait.name: Hearth of Moonlight and Shadow
entries: At the start of a short or long rest, Amble can touch a point in space, and an {@condition invisible}, 30-foot-radius sphere of magic appears, centered on that point. Total cover blocks the sphere.
While within the sphere, Amble and their allies gain a +5 bonus to Destresa (Stealth) and Saviesa (Perception) checks, and any light from open flames in the sphere isn't visible outside it.
The sphere vanishes at the end of the rest or when Amble leaves the sphere.

trait.name: Aguantar la Respiració
entries: Amble can hold their breath for up to 1 hour at a time.

trait.name: Balm of the Summer Court (12d6)
entries: (As a Bonus Action) Amble can choose one creature they can see within 120 feet of them and spend up to {@dice 6d6} of their die pool. Roll the spent dice and add them together. The target regains a number of hit points equal to the total. The target also gains 1 temporary hit point per die spent. Amble regains all expended dice when they finish a long rest.

trait.name: Hidden Paths (4/Dia)
entries: (As a Bonus Action) Amble may teleport up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space they can see.

action.name: Canviar de Forma (2/Dia)
entries: Amble magically polymorphs into a beast with a challenge rating of 1 or less, and can remain in this form for up to 6 hours. Amble's equipment melds with their new form. Amble reverts to their true form if they die or fall {@condition unconscious}. Amble can revert to their true form using a bonus action on their turn.

Amble's game statistics are replaced by the statistics of the beast, but they retain their alignment, personality, and Intel·ligència, Saviesa, and Carisma scores. Amble also retains all their skill and saving throw proficiencies, in addition to gaining those of the creature. If the creature has the same proficiency as Amble and the bonus in its stat block is higher, use the creature's bonus instead of Amble's.

When Amble transforms, they assume the beast's hit points and Hit Dice. When Amble reverts to their normal form, they return to the number of hit points they had before they transformed. However, if Amble reverts as a result of dropping to 0 hit points, any excess damage carries over their normal form.

Amble can't cast spells, and their ability to speak or take any action that requires hands is limited to the capabilities of their beast form. Transforming doesn't break Amble's concentration on a spell they've already cast however, or prevent them from taking actions that are part of a spell.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Garrot
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar ({@hit 8} a impactar with shillelagh), 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany contundent, o 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany contundent with shillelagh.

items.name: Frenesí de Sang
entries: Fhenimore té avantatge a impactar a melé contra tota criatura que no tingui tots els seus punts de cop.

action.replace: Veu del Kraken (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)

items.name: Multi-atac
entries: Fhenimore can attack once with her bite attack and once with Thunderous Touch.

items.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Gar és un llançador de conjurs de nivell 13. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és is Saviesa ({@dc 18} salvada de conjur, {@hit 10} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de druida preparats:
footerEntries: *Circle spells don't count against spells prepared.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: Gar pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si Gar falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Caminar per l'Aigua
entries: Gar pot moure's i quedar-se sobre superfícies líquides com si fossin sòlides.

trait.name: Mort passada per Aigua
entries: Quan en Gar es queda a 0 punts de cop, el seu cos es torna aigua fosca que es dispersa ràpidament. Except for Wave and his claw, anything he was wearing or carrying is left behind.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Gar makes two melee attacks, one with his claw and one with Wave.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany contundent, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 16} per escapar). Until the grapple ends, Gar can't attack other creatures with his claw.

action.name: Wave
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) de dany perforant or 10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) de dany perforant when used with two hands. If Gar scores a critical hit with this weapon, the target takes extra necrotic damage equal to half its hit point maximum.

action.name: Umberlee's Wake {@recharge 5}
entries: Power ripples out in a 60-foot radius sphere from a point within range (150 ft.) as the will of Umberlee affects all in her watery embrace. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 18}. On a failed save, the creature can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the creature can use either an action or a bonus action on its turn, but not both. These effects last for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself with a successful save. This only affects targets that are submerged or floating in water. Gar Shatterkeel and any undead serving him are immune to this effect.

legendary.name: Moure
entries: Gar moves up to his speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Urpa
entries: Gar makes one attack with his claw.

legendary.name: Wave (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Gar makes one attack with Wave with advantage.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de Shoalar és Constitució ({@dc 14} salvada de conjur, {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics). He can innately cast the following spells:

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Shoalar és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 7. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Carisma (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Coneix els encanteris de fetiller següents:

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: Shoalar pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o ranged 20/60 ft., un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany perforant.

action.replace: Veu del Kraken (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)

items.name: Ink Cloud
entries: While underwater, Whymsee can expel an ink cloud in a 20-foot radius. The cloud spreads around corners, and that area is heavily obscured to creatures other than kraken priests or a kraken. Each creature other than a kraken priest or a kraken that ends its turn there ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 14}. Qui falli rep 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany de verí; si supera, en rep la meitat. A strong current disperses the cloud, which otherwise disappears at the end of Whymsee's next turn.

items.name: Shell Defense
entries: Whymsee withdraws into her shell. Until she emerges, she gains a +4 bonus to AC and has advantage on Força and Constitució saving throws. While in her shell, Whymsee is {@condition prone}, her speed is 0 and can't increase, she has disadvantage on Destresa saving throws, it can't take reactions, and the only action she can take is a bonus action to emerge.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The kraken pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The kraken makes two tentacle attacks, each of which it can replace with one use of Fling.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) de dany perforant.

If the target is a Medium or smaller creature {@condition grappled} by the kraken, that creature is swallowed and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the kraken, and it takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany d'àcid at the start of each of the kraken's turns. One Medium or two smaller creatures can be swallowed at the same time.

If the kraken takes 35 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the kraken ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 23} at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in spaces within 10 feet of the kraken. If the kraken dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse using 10 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 20 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d6 + 7}) de dany contundent, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 20} per escapar). Until the grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}. The kraken has ten tentacles, each of which can grapple un objectiu.

action.name: Fling
entries: One Medium or smaller object held or creature {@condition grappled} by the kraken is thrown up to 40 feet in a random direction and knocked {@condition prone}. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface, the target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany contundent for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 13} or take the same damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Llança de Llamp
entries: The kraken magically create a bolt of lightning, which can strike a target the kraken can see within 90 feet of it. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 18}. Qui falli rep 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany elèctric; si supera, en rep la meitat.
